00048 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Function: CodeEditorSettingsPage()
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 CodeEditorSettingsPage::CodeEditorSettingsPage(QSettings& settings) : settings_(settings),
00052                                                                       indentWidthEdit_(0),
00053                                                                       fontCombo_(0),
00054                                                                       fontSizeCombo_(0),
00055                                                                       highlightTypeList_(0)
00056 {
00057     // Create the indentation group and all of its widgets.
00058     QGroupBox* indentGroup = new QGroupBox(tr("Indentation"), this);
00059 
00060     QLabel* indentWidthLabel = new QLabel(tr("Indent width:"), indentGroup);
00061     indentWidthEdit_ = new QLineEdit(indentGroup);
00062     indentWidthEdit_->setFixedWidth(40);
00063     indentWidthEdit_->setValidator(new QRegExpValidator(QRegExp("^\\d+$"), this));
00064 
00065     QHBoxLayout* widthLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00066     widthLayout->addWidget(indentWidthLabel);
00067     widthLayout->addWidget(indentWidthEdit_);
00068     widthLayout->addStretch(1);
00069 
00070     indentStyleRadioButtons_[AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_TAB] =
00071         new QRadioButton(tr("Use tabs"), indentGroup);
00072     indentStyleRadioButtons_[AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES] =
00073         new QRadioButton(tr("Use spaces"), indentGroup);
00074 
00075     QVBoxLayout* indentLayout = new QVBoxLayout(indentGroup);
00076     indentLayout->addLayout(widthLayout);
00077     indentLayout->addWidget(indentStyleRadioButtons_[AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_TAB]);
00078     indentLayout->addWidget(indentStyleRadioButtons_[AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES]);
00079 
00080     // Create the font & colors group and all of its widgets.
00081     QGroupBox* fontColorGroup = new QGroupBox(tr("Font and Colors"), this);
00082 
00083     QLabel* fontLabel = new QLabel(tr("Font:"), fontColorGroup);
00084     fontCombo_ = new QFontComboBox(fontColorGroup);
00085     fontCombo_->setWritingSystem(QFontDatabase::Latin);
00086     fontCombo_->setFixedWidth(320);
00087     connect(fontCombo_, SIGNAL(currentFontChanged(QFont const&)), this, SLOT(updateSample()));
00088 
00089     QLabel* fontSizeLabel = new QLabel(tr("Size:"), fontColorGroup);
00090     fontSizeCombo_ = new QComboBox(fontColorGroup);
00091     fontSizeCombo_->setFixedWidth(80);
00092     fontSizeCombo_->setMaxVisibleItems(MAX_FONT_SIZE - MIN_FONT_SIZE + 1);
00093 
00094     for (int size = MIN_FONT_SIZE; size <= MAX_FONT_SIZE; ++size)
00095     {
00096         fontSizeCombo_->addItem(QString::number(size));
00097     }
00098 
00099     connect(fontSizeCombo_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)), this, SLOT(updateSample()));
00100 
00101     QGridLayout* fontLayout = new QGridLayout();
00102     fontLayout->addWidget(fontLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00103     fontLayout->addWidget(fontCombo_, 1, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00104     fontLayout->addWidget(fontSizeLabel, 0, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00105     fontLayout->addWidget(fontSizeCombo_, 1, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00106     fontLayout->setColumnStretch(1, 1);
00107 
00108     QLabel* highlightLabel = new QLabel(tr("Syntax highlight for:"), fontColorGroup);
00109     highlightTypeList_ = new QListWidget(fontColorGroup);
00110     highlightTypeList_->setFixedWidth(208);
00111     connect(highlightTypeList_, SIGNAL(currentItemChanged(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)),
00112             this, SLOT(onSelectStyle(QListWidgetItem*, QListWidgetItem*)));
00113 
00114     for (int i = 0; i < MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_COUNT; ++i)
00115     {
00116         highlightTypeList_->addItem(STYLE_NAMES[i]);
00117     }
00118 
00119     QLabel* colorLabel = new QLabel(tr("Color:"), fontColorGroup);
00120     colorBox_ = new ColorBox(QSize(56, 56), fontColorGroup);
00121     connect(colorBox_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectColor()));
00122 
00123     boldCheckBox_ = new QCheckBox(tr("Bold"), fontColorGroup);
00124     connect(boldCheckBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(updateSample()));
00125 
00126     italicCheckBox_ = new QCheckBox(tr("Italic"), fontColorGroup);
00127     connect(italicCheckBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(updateSample()));
00128 
00129     QVBoxLayout* checkLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00130     checkLayout->addWidget(boldCheckBox_);
00131     checkLayout->addWidget(italicCheckBox_);
00132 
00133     QLabel* sampleLabel = new QLabel(tr("Sample:"), fontColorGroup);
00134     sampleBox_ = new ColorBox(QSize(208, 44), fontColorGroup);
00135     sampleBox_->setColor(Qt::white);
00136     sampleBox_->setText("AaBbCcXxYyZz");
00137 
00138     QVBoxLayout* sampleLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00139     sampleLayout->addWidget(sampleLabel);
00140     sampleLayout->addWidget(sampleBox_);
00141    
00142     QGridLayout* colorLayout = new QGridLayout();
00143     colorLayout->addWidget(highlightLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00144     colorLayout->addWidget(highlightTypeList_, 1, 0, 2, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00145     colorLayout->addWidget(colorLabel, 0, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft);
00146     colorLayout->addWidget(colorBox_, 1, 1, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00147     colorLayout->addLayout(checkLayout, 1, 2, 1, 1, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00148     colorLayout->addLayout(sampleLayout, 2, 1, 1, 2, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00149     colorLayout->setColumnStretch(2, 1);
00150 
00151     QVBoxLayout* fontColorLayout = new QVBoxLayout(fontColorGroup);
00152     fontColorLayout->addLayout(fontLayout);
00153     fontColorLayout->addSpacing(12);
00154     fontColorLayout->addLayout(colorLayout);
00155 
00156     // Setup the layout.
00157     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00158     layout->addWidget(indentGroup);
00159     layout->addWidget(fontColorGroup);
00160     layout->addStretch(1);
00161 
00162     loadSettings();
00163     highlightTypeList_->setCurrentRow(0);
00164 }

00173 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 // Function: validate()
00175 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 bool CodeEditorSettingsPage::validate()
00177 {
00178     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00179 
00180     if (indentWidthEdit_->text().isEmpty() || indentWidthEdit_->text().toInt() < 1 ||
00181         indentWidthEdit_->text().toInt() > 60)
00182     {
00183         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00184                            tr("Please enter an indent width between 1 and 60."), QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00185         msgBox.exec();
00186         return false;
00187     }
00188 
00189     return true;
00190 }
00191 
00192 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 // Function: apply()
00194 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00195 void CodeEditorSettingsPage::apply()
00196 {
00197     // Store the current style's settings to the data structure.
00198     int row = highlightTypeList_->currentRow();
00199     styles_[row].bold = boldCheckBox_->isChecked();
00200     styles_[row].italic = italicCheckBox_->isChecked();
00201     styles_[row].color = colorBox_->getColor();
00202 
00203     // Save the settings.
00204     settings_.setValue("editor/indentWidth", indentWidthEdit_->text().toInt());
00205     
00206     if (indentStyleRadioButtons_[AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES]->isChecked())
00207     {
00208         settings_.setValue("editor/indentStyle", AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES);
00209     }
00210     else
00211     {
00212         settings_.setValue("editor/indentStyle", AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_TAB);
00213     }
00214 
00215     QFont font = fontCombo_->currentFont();
00216     font.setPointSize(fontSizeCombo_->currentText().toInt());
00217     settings_.setValue("editor/font", QVariant::fromValue(font));
00218 
00219     for (int i = 0; i < MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_COUNT; ++i)
00220     {
00221         settings_.setValue("editor/highlight/" + MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_IDS[i],
00222                            QVariant::fromValue(styles_[i]));
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00226 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 // Function: onPageChange()
00228 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00229 bool CodeEditorSettingsPage::onPageChange()
00230 {
00231     // Do not change the page if the settings are invalid.
00232     if (!validate())
00233     {
00234         return false;
00235     }
00236 
00237     return true;
00238 }

00240 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00241 // Function: loadSettings()
00242 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00243 void CodeEditorSettingsPage::loadSettings()
00244 {
00245     // Load indentation settings.
00246     unsigned int width = settings_.value("editor/indentWidth", 4).toInt();
00247     indentWidthEdit_->setText(QString::number(width));
00248 
00249     AssistedTextEdit::IndentStyle style =
00250         static_cast<AssistedTextEdit::IndentStyle>(settings_.value("editor/indentStyle",
00251                                                    AssistedTextEdit::INDENT_STYLE_SPACES).toInt());
00252 
00253     indentStyleRadioButtons_[style]->setChecked(true);
00254     indentStyleRadioButtons_[1 - style]->setChecked(false);
00255 
00256     // Load font and highlight settings.
00257     QFont font = settings_.value("editor/font", QVariant::fromValue(QFont("Courier New", 10))).value<QFont>();
00258     fontCombo_->setCurrentFont(font);
00259     fontSizeCombo_->setCurrentIndex(font.pointSize() - MIN_FONT_SIZE);
00260 
00261     qRegisterMetaTypeStreamOperators<HighlightStyleDesc>("HighlightStyleDesc");
00262 
00263     for (int i = 0; i < MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_COUNT; ++i)
00264     {
00265         styles_[i] = settings_.value("editor/highlight/" + MCAPIHighlighter::STYLE_IDS[i],
00266             QVariant::fromValue(MCAPIHighlighter::DEFAULT_STYLES[i])).value<HighlightStyleDesc>();
00267     }
00268 }
00269 
00270 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 // Function: selectColor()
00272 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00273 void CodeEditorSettingsPage::selectColor()
00274 {
00275     QColorDialog dialog(this);
00276     dialog.setCurrentColor(colorBox_->getColor());
00277     
00278     if (dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
00279     {
00280         colorBox_->setColor(dialog.currentColor());
00281         updateSample();
00282     }
00283 }
00284 
00285 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 // Function: updateSample()
00287 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 void CodeEditorSettingsPage::updateSample()
00289 {
00290     sampleBox_->setTextColor(colorBox_->getColor());
00291 
00292     QFont font = fontCombo_->currentFont();
00293     font.setPointSize(fontSizeCombo_->currentText().toInt());
00294     font.setBold(boldCheckBox_->isChecked());
00295     font.setItalic(italicCheckBox_->isChecked());
00296 
00297     sampleBox_->setTextFont(font);
00298 }
00299 
00300 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00301 // Function: onSelectStyle()
00302 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00303 void CodeEditorSettingsPage::onSelectStyle(QListWidgetItem* cur, QListWidgetItem* prev)
00304 {
00305     int prevRow = highlightTypeList_->row(prev);
00306     int curRow = highlightTypeList_->row(cur);
00307 
00308     if (prevRow >= 0)
00309     {
00310         // Save the previous style.
00311         styles_[prevRow].bold = boldCheckBox_->isChecked();
00312         styles_[prevRow].italic = italicCheckBox_->isChecked();
00313         styles_[prevRow].color = colorBox_->getColor();
00314     }
00315 
00316     // Import the settings from the new style.
00317     colorBox_->setColor(styles_[curRow].color);
00318     boldCheckBox_->setChecked(styles_[curRow].bold);
00319     italicCheckBox_->setChecked(styles_[curRow].italic);
00320 
00321     updateSample();
00322 }
